name: Services Marketplace
description: Home services, tutoring, freelance. Commission-based, variable frequency.

aov.help: Average booking value. Home cleaning: $100–200. Tutoring: $40–80/session.

orders_per_month.help: Monthly booking frequency. Services are typically 1–3x/month.

gross_margin_pct.help: Commission on each booking. Thumbtack charges 15–30%. Rover takes ~20%.

variable_cost_per_order.help: Per-booking costs: payment processing, insurance, quality assurance, customer support.

monthly_churn_rate.help: Monthly churn. Services marketplaces typically see 4–8% monthly churn.

monthly_arpu_growth_rate.help: Do customers book more expensive or more frequent services over time?

monthly_fixed_costs.help: Platform development, trust & safety, operations team.
